about_the_game:
Change the branch campus students' costumes to the Thors' main campus uniform.

Thors Main Campus Uniform x 5
Altina's Main Campus Hat x 1
Musse's Main Campus Hat x 1
*Juna, Kurt, Altina, Musse, and Ash can wear these costumes.

*These items can be obtained from the DLC tab on the Item page. After obtaining the items, they can be equipped from the Costume page on the Camp Menu.
